QuestData.Title: Turning Timber into Profit
QuestData.Description: Now that you know how to put lumberjacks to work harvesting timber, we're going to create a work order for your mill.$B$BBut first we're going to need some timber to process!$B$BAll around Draenor are juicy trees ripe for the chopping. Go out and find suitable timber for the lumber mill. Come back here when you have enough and we'll get started on a work order.$B$BAnd as usual, let the lumberjacks do the hard work. Just keep 'em protected. Draenor's a dangerous place!
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 10 pieces of Timber from around Draenor and then Place a Work Order at your Garrison's Lumber Mill.
QuestData.RewardText: That's how it's done, commander!$B$BWe're now fully operational. Any time you have enough timber to place a work order, come on back to me and we'll get started.$B$BThis garrison ain't gonna build itself!
